p: HEK-293T cells were seeded into white 96-well plates at 3 × 10 4 cells/well. After 24h, cells were transfected with linear PEI (polyethylenimine) (Polysciences Inc.) with 200 ng of plasmid expressing a viral protein fused to Gluc1 at its N-terminus (PB1, PB1, PA, NP, NS1, NEP) or at its C-terminus (M1) and 100 ng of a Gluc2-ExoRDec-expressing plasmid. At 24 h post-transfection, cells were washed with 100 μl of phosphate buffered saline and lysed with 40 μl of Renilla lysis buffer (Promega E2820) for 30 min at room temperature. Gaussia princeps luciferase enzymatic activity was measured with a Berthold Centro LB960 luminometer by injecting 50 μl of luciferase substrate reagent (Promega E2820) per well and measuring luminescence for 10s. Results were expressed in relative luminescence units.
